MajorClaims.MC1: Using public transportation has a lot of advantages for the modern society facing a lot of problems: the environmental population, the isolation in life, the depletion of natural resources
MajorClaims.MC2: The development of public transportation is the most essential thing for a developed society

Claims.C1: The use of public transportation is the best way to conserve natural resources gradually run out
Claims.C2: The use of public transportation helps in reducing the air pollution
Claims.C3: The use of public transportation make us live more sociable
Claims.C4: Public transportation keeps society from the depletion of natural resources, the air pollution, the loss of a sense of community

Premises.P1: Cars depend on oil and gasoline to move
Premises.P2: If people use too many private cars, the oil and gasoline nonrenewable will run out quickly
Premises.P3: Instead of using many private cars, people can use public transportation, such as bus, train, subway, each one can get far more people and less oil and gasoline are used up per person
Premises.P4: Cars use oil and gasoline and send out gas such as carbon dioxide, heat and so on
Premises.P5: They cause pollution and make the Earth warmer
Premises.P6: The more cars are driven, the more pollution will be put into air
Premises.P7: If we use the public transportation, less cars will be used and less pollution will be emitted
Premises.P8: The atmosphere, surrounding us, will be protected and help us more healthy
Premises.P9: When we drive a private car, we are alone or only our family members that we already know and lost the opportunity to make friends with others or to see that we are a part of this society
Premises.P10: When using public transportation, we have a chance to meet more people and more chances to discovery new aspects of life
